price: Suka ce: "Ka rõƙa mana Ubangijinka, Ya bayyana mana abin da yake ita, lalle ne shãnu suna yi mana kamã da jũna, kuma mu, idan Allah Yã so, haƙĩƙa, shiryuwa ne."
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيِّن لَّنَا مَا هِيَ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَقَرَ تَشَٰبَهَ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِنَّآ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū ud'ʿu lanā rabbaka yubayyin lanā mā hiya inna al-baqara tashābaha ʿalaynā wa-innā in shāa al-lahu lamuh'tadūna
translations: (will) surely be those who are guided
